mapper.select:
select distinct etl.targetclassguid from erp_transfer_log etl
and etl.guid = #GUID#
and etl.targetguid = #TARGETGUID#
and etl.erpname = #ERPNAME#
and etl.erpoperation = #ERPOPERATION#
and etl.erpfactory = #ERPFACTORY#
and etl.iteration = #ITERATION#

select etl.guid, etl.targetguid, etl.erpname, etl.erpoperation, etl.category, etl.erpfactory, etl.createuserguid, etl.createtime, etl.iteration, ma.id mid, ma.name mname, ma.revisionid mrevisionid from erp_transfer_log etl, $tablename$ ma where etl.targetguid=ma.guid and etl.targetclassguid=#CLASSGUID#
and etl.guid = #GUID#
and etl.targetguid = #TARGETGUID#
and etl.erpname = #ERPNAME#
and etl.erpoperation = #ERPOPERATION#
and etl.erpfactory = #ERPFACTORY#
and etl.iteration = #ITERATION#

select distinct br.end1$$class from erp_transfer_log etl, $tablename$ br where etl.targetguid=br.guid
and etl.guid = #GUID#
and etl.targetguid = #TARGETGUID#
and etl.erpname = #ERPNAME#
and etl.erpoperation = #ERPOPERATION#
and etl.erpfactory = #ERPFACTORY#
and etl.iteration = #ITERATION#

select etl.guid, etl.targetguid, etl.erpname, etl.erpoperation, etl.category, etl.erpfactory, etl.createuserguid, etl.createtime, etl.iteration, ma.id mid, ma.name mname, ma.revisionid mrevisionid from erp_transfer_log etl, $END1TABLENAME$ ma, $tablename$ br where etl.targetguid=br.guid and br.end1=ma.guid and br.end1$$class = #CLASSGUID#
and etl.guid = #GUID#
and etl.targetguid = #TARGETGUID#
and etl.erpname = #ERPNAME#
and etl.erpoperation = #ERPOPERATION#
and etl.erpfactory = #ERPFACTORY#
and etl.iteration = #ITERATION#
mapper.insert:
insert into erp_transfer_log (guid, targetguid, targetclassguid, erpname, erpoperation, category, erpfactory, iteration,
createuserguid, createtime) values (#GUID#, #TARGETGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #TARGETCLASSGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ERPNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ERPOPERATION:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CATEGORY:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ERPFACTORY:VARCHAR:NULL#, #ITERATION#,
#CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#)
